text: Fatma Pınar Aylin (born 12 May 1972, Izmir) is a Turkish singer. She first became known with her song "Deliler Gibi" (Like crazy) in 1995. ==Albums== *1995: Ben Bahara Hazırım *1997: Güneşten *1998: Ay Işığında *2000: Çöl Fırtınası *2004: No. 5 *2007: Aslolan Ben *2011: Hit 70'ler === EP === *2009: Masal Bu Ya === Single === *2019: "Aradığın Aşk Bende" *2019: "Yazık Oldu" ==References== ==Other websites== *official website *Spotify page Pınar Aylin *Instagram page Pınar Aylin *Twitter page Pınar Aylin Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish singers
title: Pınar Aylin
